column4: hy ,i just installed latest ubuntu version its working fine but i dont know how to change the resolution ... can some1 help me pls?
you probably need the non-ree drivers installed for your graphics card
i see on "device driver" nvidia new and a checkbox that is checkt under enable but the status is "not in use"
you need to put it in use evidently. is there an option for that?
try to uncheck it, then check it again
done and it says need computer restart ... i will restart my computer and then i will be back
nothing ... its still the same message on that status : "not in use"
is medibuntu.org repo enabled in System > Admin > Software Sources?
the website ... i cant find it on any option from software sources
then after that, add the pgp key by doing: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install medibuntu-keyring && sudo apt-get update
i did all you sayd he installed alot of things...now what?
i installed all those things but i still cant change my resolution my graphic card is in use not
your best bet now is probably use envy if you have nVidia or ATI
